text: tapā'ī bhannus ki timrā sājhēdāraharūmadhyē yastō kōhī cha jasalē satyakō mārga dēkhā'una saktacha? Bhanidinus ki allāhalē nai satyakō mārga dēkhā'um̐cha. Ani kē jasalē satyakō mārga dēkhā'um̐cha, tyō yasa yōgya cha ki tyasakō anuśaraṇa gariyōs athavā tyō jasalā'ī jabasam'ma mārga na dēkhā'iyōs tabasam'ma āphai bāṭō pā'um̐daina? Tasartha timīlā'ī kē bha'ēkō cha, timī kastō phaisalā gardachau
